'''Jon Rappoport''' is an American author and blogger who has gained notoriety for promoting conspiracy theories and spreading misinformation. Rappoport has appeared as a guest on [[InfoWars]] many times, and was a regular fixture in early [[Knowledge Fight]] episodes.

Rappoport has a history of promoting discredited theories about vaccines, HIV, and other medical topics. He has also been known to downplay the severity of public health crises such as the [[Covid-19]] pandemic. Rappoport's writings have been criticized by numerous medical experts and public health organizations for spreading dangerous misinformation that can lead to harm.
